channel.title: MIT on 布萊德的學習網站
channel.description: Recent content in MIT on 布萊德的學習網站

item.title: Therapists are augmenting eating-disorder treatment with virtual-reality headsets
item.description: therapists:(n) [‘θerəpɪst] 心理治療師; 臨床醫學家 augmenting:(v) [ɔ:g’mentiŋ] 增強; 加強 He has to find work to augment his income. eating-disorder: 飲食失調 treatment:(n) [‘triːtm(ə)nt] 療法 The best treatment for a cold is to rest and drink lots of fluids. 治疗感冒的最佳方法是休息和多喝水. Though most consumers aren’t yet sure what to do with VR, some psychologists are using it to treat anorexia and bulimia. psychologists:(n) [saɪ’kɒlədʒɪst] 心理學家
